entry.title: Who we are
entry.summary: My name is John Williams. I started North Chatham Home Services in 2020, after leaving a successful 15-year corporate career as a user experience designer. I have always loved working with my hands. I often dreamt of that as my vocation. North Chatham Home Services…
entry.content:
My name is John Williams. I started North Chatham Home Services in 2020, after leaving a successful 15-year corporate career as a user experience designer. I have always loved working with my hands. I often dreamt of that as my vocation. North Chatham Home Services is the manifestation of that dream.

I currently live in Pittsboro, NC. I am the proud father of Julian, my 16 year-old son. In my free time, I enjoy building things with my hands (I have many tools), cycling, nature and thrift shopping. I also play music occasionally.

I possess an MS in Technical Communication and an MA in History, both from North Carolina State University.

To see the types of things that occupy and inspire me, visit myÂ Fave things page that lives on my old user experience design portfolio site.

We proudly provide services to Pittsboro, NC and surrounding communities - including Chapel Hill and Carrboro. When calling, please leave a…
entry.content:
Need help fixing, upgrading, remodeling, or beautifying your home? Do you need a handyman? Fix-it? Jack-of-all-trades? Not sure? We proudly provide services to Pittsboro, NC and surrounding communities - including Chapel Hill and Carrboro.

When calling, please leave a voice message. I will return all calls within 1 business day.

NCHS is registered as an LLC with the State of North Carolina. I am fully insured and I guarantee all work.

entry.title: Services
entry.summary: What follows is a general list of services we provide. If you have a need that is not listed here, please contact me to discuss and I will assess the project and provide an honest free appraisal. We offer a diverse range of general home…
entry.content:
What follows is a general list of services we provide. If you have a need that is not listed here, please contact me to discuss and I will assess the project and provide an honest free appraisal.

  • Deck building, refurbishment and rehab
  • General light construction
  • General repairs
  • Remodeling
  • Assemble furniture
  • Clean gutters
  • Install, repair, patch drywall
  • Install fan
  • Install, repair flooring
  • Install, repair tile work
  • Install, replace plumbing (including fixtures, sinks and toilets)
  • Electronic installation & repair
  • Mount TV
  • Home theater set-up
  • Paint indoors
  • Replace tile work
  • Waterproofing

We offer a diverse range of general home services. We are basically willing to consider any job that:

  1. does not require a state-licensed specialist
  2. is permitted under my insurance coverage

Contact us at 919-428-9381 to discuss your needs. You may also complete our contact form as contact. Please provide basic details of the job(s) you seek assistance with.
